thread.title: Union council chairman beats man, girl in arbitration, video goes viral
thread.title_full: Union council chairman beats man, girl in arbitration, video goes viral

title: Union council chairman beats man, girl in arbitration, video goes viral
text:
Union council chairman beats man, girl in arbitration, video goes viral Laxmipur Correspondent, bdnews24.com Previous Next A video of a Union Parishad chairman beating a man and a girl during arbitration in Laxmipur's Kamalnagar has gone viral on the social media. 
Char Martin Union Parishad Chairman Yusuf Ali is also President of ruling Awami League's local union council unit. 
Yusuf told bdnews24.com on Monday that he only 'slapped' the man and his sister-in-law on charges of eloping on Dec 31 last year. 
In the video, the UP chairman and another person can be seen beating a man with sticks. 
Yusuf kicked the man when he fell down. 
The UP chairman then beat up the girl in the same fashion. 
Kamalnagar Police Station OC Akul Chandra Biswas said steps will be taken if someone registers a complaint over the incident.
